description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，第五代最高领导人，曾任苏联共产党中央委员会总书记和苏联最高苏维埃主席团主席。
description.en: A Soviet politician who was the fifth supreme leader of the Soviet Union, serving as General Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet.

description.zh-cn: 苏联前任最高领导人，在1964年被勃列日涅夫等人发动的政变推翻。
description.en: Former supreme leader of the Soviet Union, who was overthrown in a 1964 coup launched by Brezhnev and others.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，在勃列日涅夫去世后继任苏共中央总书记。
description.en: A Soviet politician who succeeded Brezhnev as General Secretary of the CPSU after his death.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，与勃列日涅夫、波德戈尔内一同发动政变并组成“三驾马车”的集体领导。
description.en: A Soviet politician who, along with Brezhnev and Podgorny, launched a coup and formed the 'troika' of collective leadership.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，勃列日涅夫的政治盟友，共同发动政变推翻赫鲁晓夫。
description.en: A Soviet politician and political ally of Brezhnev who co-launched the coup to overthrow Khrushchev.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，参与了推翻赫鲁晓夫的政变。
description.en: A Soviet politician who participated in the coup that overthrew Khrushchev.

nodes.id: 亚历山大·尼古拉耶维奇·谢列平

zh-cn: 亚历山大·尼古拉耶维奇·谢列平

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治人物，参与推翻赫鲁晓夫的政变，后被勃列日涅夫解除职务。
description.en: A Soviet politician who participated in the coup that overthrew Khrushchev and was later dismissed by Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 苏联最后一任最高领导人，上台后谴责勃列日涅夫政府的无能，并实施开放政策。
description.en: The last supreme leader of the Soviet Union, who upon taking power, condemned the incompetence of the Brezhnev government and implemented the policy of Glasnost.

description.zh-cn: 苏联前任最高领导人，勃列日涅夫时期终止了“去斯大林化”并对其历史作用予以部分肯定。
description.en: A former supreme leader of the Soviet Union. During the Brezhnev era, 'de-Stalinization' was halted, and his historical role was partially affirmed.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一代最高领导人，其治下的中国与勃列日涅夫时期的苏联爆发了边界冲突。
description.en: The first-generation supreme leader of the People's Republic of China. Under his rule, China had border conflicts with the Soviet Union during the Brezhnev era.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·安瓦尔·萨达特

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·安瓦尔·萨达特

description.zh-cn: 埃及前总统，在第四次中东战争后与苏联关系破裂。
description.en: Former President of Egypt, whose relations with the Soviet Union broke down after the Yom Kippur War.

description.zh-cn: 美国前总统，曾与勃列日涅夫签订SALT II条约。
description.en: Former U.S. President who signed the SALT II treaty with Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 美国前总统，曾与勃列日涅夫签订SALT I条约。
description.en: Former U.S. President who signed the SALT I treaty with Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 美国前总统，其提出的“星球大战计划”给苏联经济带来了巨大压力。
description.en: Former U.S. President whose 'Star Wars' program placed significant strain on the Soviet economy.

description.zh-cn: 列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Leonid Brezhnev.

zh-cn: 加林娜·列昂尼多夫娜·勃列日涅娃

description.zh-cn: 列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Leonid Brezhnev.

zh-cn: 尤里·列昂尼多维奇·勃列日涅夫

description.zh-cn: 列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫的儿子。
description.en: Son of Leonid Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 苏联作家，《古拉格群岛》的作者，在勃列日涅夫时期被流放。
description.en: Soviet writer, author of 'The Gulag Archipelago', who was exiled during the Brezhnev era.

en: Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 苏联共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 苏联共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联共产党的最高决策机构。
description.en: The highest decision-making body of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.

nodes.id: 苏联最高苏维埃主席团

zh-cn: 苏联最高苏维埃主席团
en: Presidium of the Supreme Soviet of the Soviet Union

description.zh-cn: 苏联名义上的国家元首机构。
description.en: The nominal head of state body of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 指勃列日涅夫执政时期苏联社会、政治、经济陷入停滞的时代。
description.en: Refers to the period of Brezhnev's rule when Soviet society, politics, and economy entered a state of stagnation.

description.zh-cn: 由勃列日涅夫等人发动，旨在推翻赫鲁晓夫的政治事件。
description.en: A political event initiated by Brezhnev and others aimed at overthrowing Khrushchev.

description.zh-cn: 捷克斯洛伐克的一场政治民主化运动，后被勃列日涅夫下令镇压。
description.en: A political democratization movement in Czechoslovakia, which was later suppressed by order of Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 1969年发生在中国和苏联边界上的一系列武装冲突。
description.en: A series of armed clashes that occurred on the border between China and the Soviet Union in 1969.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫下令苏联军队入侵阿富汗引发的战争，被认为是导致苏联解体的重要因素之一。
description.en: A war sparked by Brezhnev's order for Soviet troops to invade Afghanistan, considered one of the key factors leading to the dissolution of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 由赫鲁晓夫发起的清除斯大林时期政治和意识形态影响的运动。
description.en: A movement initiated by Khrushchev to remove the political and ideological influence of the Stalin era.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫时期苏联的外交政策，声称当华沙条约成员国的社会主义政权受到威胁时，苏联可以进行武力干涉。
description.en: The foreign policy of the Soviet Union during the Brezhnev era, which claimed that the Soviet Union could intervene with military force when the socialist regime of a Warsaw Pact member was threatened.

nodes.id: 苏联及华沙条约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克

zh-cn: 苏联及华沙条约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克
苏联及华约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导的华沙条约军队为镇压“布拉格之春”而对捷克斯洛伐克进行的军事入侵。
description.en: A military invasion of Czechoslovakia led by the Soviet Union and Warsaw Pact forces to suppress the 'Prague Spring'.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 由美国总统罗纳德·里根提出的战略防御计划，旨在建立太空导弹防御系统，对苏联构成了巨大的经济和军事压力。
description.en: A strategic defense plan proposed by U.S. President Ronald Reagan, aimed at creating a space-based missile defense system, which placed immense economic and military pressure on the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 赫鲁晓夫执政时期苏联在政治和文化领域出现的一段相对自由化的时期。
description.en: A period of relative liberalization in the political and cultural spheres of the Soviet Union during Khrushchev's rule.

description.zh-cn: 列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫于1928年与维多利亚·勃列日涅娃结婚。
description.en: Leonid Brezhnev married Viktoria Brezhneva in 1928.

description.zh-cn: 加林娜·勃列日涅娃是列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫的女儿。
description.en: Galina Brezhneva was the daughter of Leonid Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 尤里·勃列日涅夫是列昂尼德·勃列日涅夫的儿子。
description.en: Yuri Brezhnev was the son of Leonid Brezhnev.

description.zh-cn: 1964年10月的政变迫使赫鲁晓夫提前退休。
description.en: The October 1964 coup forced Khrushchev into early retirement.

description.zh-cn: 通过1964年10月的政变，勃列日涅夫上台成为苏共中央第一书记。
description.en: Through the October 1964 coup, Brezhnev came to power as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the CPSU.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫与柯西金、苏斯洛夫、谢列平和波德戈尔内等人共同发动了推翻赫鲁晓夫的政变。
description.en: Brezhnev, along with Kosygin, Suslov, Shelepin, and Podgorny, jointly launched the coup to overthrow Khrushchev.

relationships.target: 亚历山大·尼古拉耶维奇·谢列平

description.zh-cn: 在推翻赫鲁晓夫后，勃列日涅夫与众人一起解除了谢列平的职务。
description.en: After overthrowing Khrushchev, Brezhnev and others jointly dismissed Shelepin from his posts.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫的执政时期被称为“停滞时代”，其政策趋于保守和僵化，导致社会衰落。
description.en: Brezhnev's period in power is known as the 'Era of Stagnation'; his policies tended towards conservatism and rigidity, leading to social decline.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫于1966年初决定终止赫鲁晓夫时期的“非斯大林化”进程。
description.en: In early 1966, Brezhnev decided to terminate the process of 'de-Stalinization' from the Khrushchev era.

description.zh-cn: 在勃列日涅夫时代，作家索尔仁尼琴被流放。
description.en: During the Brezhnev era, writer Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn was exiled.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫的政策与赫鲁晓夫的政治改革（赫鲁晓夫解冻）相对立。
description.en: Brezhnev's policies were antagonistic to Khrushchev's political reforms (the Khrushchev Thaw).

description.zh-cn: 戈尔巴乔夫在1985年上台后，谴责勃列日涅夫政府的无能且不灵活。
description.en: After coming to power in 1985, Gorbachev condemned the Brezhnev government for its incompetence and inflexibility.

relationships.target: 苏联及华沙条约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫派军队入侵捷克斯洛伐克以镇压“布拉格之春”运动。
description.en: Brezhnev sent troops to invade Czechoslovakia to suppress the 'Prague Spring' movement.

relationships.source: 苏联及华沙条约成员国入侵捷克斯洛伐克

description.zh-cn: 苏联领导的军事入侵终结了捷克斯洛伐克的“布拉格之春”改革运动。
description.en: The Soviet-led military invasion brought an end to Czechoslovakia's 'Prague Spring' reform movement.

description.zh-cn: 由于阿富汗新政府取消了亲苏联政策，勃列日涅夫发动了阿富汗战争。
description.en: Brezhnev launched the Soviet–Afghan War because the new Afghan government had canceled its pro-Soviet policies.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫执政时期，苏联与毛泽东领导下的中华人民共和国爆发了珍宝岛等地的边界冲突，两国关系长期敌对。
description.en: During Brezhnev's rule, the Soviet Union and the People's Republic of China under Mao Zedong had border conflicts at places like Zhenbao Island, leading to a long period of hostile relations.

relationships.source: 穆罕默德·安瓦尔·萨达特

description.zh-cn: 第四次中东战争后，萨达特领导下的埃及与苏联彻底闹翻，反目成仇。
description.en: After the Yom Kippur War, Egypt under Sadat's leadership had a complete falling out with the Soviet Union, becoming enemies.

description.zh-cn: 勃列日涅夫去世后，由安德罗波夫继任总书记。
description.en: After Brezhnev's death, Andropov succeeded him as General Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1979年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统卡特签订SALT II条约。
description.en: In 1979, Brezhnev and U.S. President Carter signed the SALT II treaty.

description.zh-cn: 1974年，勃列日涅夫与美国总统福特签订SALT I条约。
description.en: In 1974, Brezhnev and U.S. President Ford signed the SALT I treaty.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统里根的“星球大战计划”耗费了苏联大量财力，加剧了其经济困境。
description.en: U.S. President Reagan's 'Strategic Defense Initiative' drained significant financial resources from the Soviet Union, exacerbating its economic difficulties.
